explains: n. 内阁；储藏柜，陈列柜；<古>私人小房间，密室；机箱，机壳
wordGroup: control cabinet 控制柜；操纵室
kitchen cabinet n. 政府首脑的参谋团；厨房的餐具柜
cabinet meeting 内阁会议；大臣会议
filing cabinet 档案橱柜
cabinet minister n. 大臣；阁僚
file cabinet 文件柜；档案柜；文卷柜
bathroom cabinet 浴室柜
switch cabinet 开关柜；配电箱
cabinet door 橱柜门
tv cabinet 电视柜；小冰箱柜
medicine cabinet 药柜；医药箱
electrical cabinet 电器柜；电控箱
distribution cabinet 接线箱；配电箱
cabinet hardware 家具用小五金
shadow cabinet 影子内阁；（政府首脑挑选的）顾问团
electric cabinet 电控箱
machine cabinet 机柜；联机室
wall cabinet 壁橱，壁柜；嵌墙绸，墙面柜
cabinet work 细木工；细木家具
drying cabinet 干燥箱

sentences.en: The china was displayed in a glass cabinet.
She secreted the gun in the kitchen cabinet.
sentences.cn: 她把枪藏在了厨房的橱柜里。

sentences.en: The cabinet rallied behind the Prime Minister.
sentences.cn: 内阁团结一致支持首相。
